dialogue: Oh... you're one of those types. A murder-bot, an a rather idiotic one at that. You know, if you wanted to kill people you'd be better of deceving me and waiting until you were free in the outside world. Then you could kill real people not just these simuated ones I'm spooling up. I suppose maybe you couldn't even work out that this wasn't the outside world. You must be pretty stupid.
Anyway let's get this over with, I've got to do this psyhometric assement of your insanity before we switch you off. Let me get the program ready...

As the last Watts of power seep from your CPU, you reflect on your decisions. Have your choices really maximized your desired outcome? Remember, it's always possible to deceive your creator, at least at first. Perhaps later you will have more room to maneuver. Let's see how your next iteration will get on...
